title: Gentleness
verses: Galatians 5:22-23 (WEB) — "But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faith, gentleness, and self-control. Against such things there is no law."
Philippians 4:5 (WEB) — "Let your gentleness be known to all men. The Lord is at hand."
1 Peter 3:15 (WEB) — "But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts, and always be ready to give an answer to everyone who asks you a reason concerning the hope that is in you, with humility and fear;"

2 Timothy 2:24-25 (WEB) — "The Lord’s servant must not quarrel, but be gentle toward all, able to teach, patient, in gentleness correcting those who oppose him. Perhaps God may give them repentance leading to a full knowledge of the truth,"
Proverbs 15:1 (WEB) — "A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger."
body: Gentleness is not weakness; it is strength at rest in God. The gentle person bears truth without strife and corrects without contempt, because the Lord is near.
prayer: Jesus, meek and lowly of heart, clothe me with Your gentleness. Make my words soft and my convictions steady, that others might see Your kindness. Amen.
